var result = Array(my_string)

for i in 0..<queries.count {
	result[queries[i][0]...queries[i][1]].reverse()
}

var result = Array(my_string)

for i in 0..<queries.count {
	result[queries[i][0]...queries[i][1]].reverse()
}

return String(result)
